mapper.select: SELECT A.region_no , A.city_serial , A.region_nm , B.open_yn , B.badge_cnt , B.quest_cnt , B.point , B.enabled_yn FROM haw.region A INNER JOIN haw.region_condition B ON (A.region_no = B.region_no) ORDER BY A.region_no
SELECT count(*) FROM haw.region A INNER JOIN haw.region_condition B ON (A.region_no = B.region_no) WHERE A.region_no = 2
